questions.text: Does [State] prohibit the sale of tobacco to minors?
If not, does any other agency oversee these issues?
What activities is this agency currently involved in to prevent access to tobacco by minors?
To what, if any, higher state or Federal office does this agency report?
In actual practice, what penalty is imposed on retailer caught selling tobacco to minors?
What agency, if any, is charged by the laws of [State] to monitor the enforcement of tobacco laws?
In actual practice, what agency monitors the enforcement of such laws and penalties and are penalties ever imposed for violations?
Who is penalized for selling tobacco products to minors?
Do you know who keeps these records?
